Featured.Title: Avengers: Endgame
Featured.Description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

TendingNow.Title: The Irishman
TendingNow.Description: Hit man Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family in this acclaimed film from Martin Scorsese.

TendingNow.Title: Inception
TendingNow.Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

TendingNow.Title: The Dark Knight
TendingNow.Description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

TendingNow.Title: Parasite
TendingNow.Description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

TendingNow.Title: Interstellar
TendingNow.Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

TendingNow.Title: Avengers: Endgame
TendingNow.Description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

TendingNow.Title: Joker
TendingNow.Description: In Gotham City, a mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of the iconic Joker persona.

TendingNow.Title: The Matrix
TendingNow.Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

TendingNow.Title: Gladiator
TendingNow.Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

TendingNow.Title: Titanic
TendingNow.Description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated RMS Titanic.

TendingNow.Title: Fight Club
TendingNow.Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

TendingNow.Title: Forrest Gump
TendingNow.Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more through the eyes of an Alabama man with a low IQ but good intentions.

TendingNow.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
TendingNow.Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

TendingNow.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
TendingNow.Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

TendingNow.Title: Saving Private Ryan
TendingNow.Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

TendingNow.Title: Avatar
TendingNow.Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

TendingNow.Title: Whiplash
TendingNow.Description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an abusive instructor.

TendingNow.Title: La La Land
TendingNow.Description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.
